apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: release-name-api-server
  labels:
    tier: airflow
    component: api-server
    release: release-name
    chart: airflow-1.18.0
    heritage: Helm
spec:
  replicas: 1
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      tier: airflow
      component: api-server
      release: release-name
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        tier: airflow
        component: api-server
        release: release-name
      annotations:
        checksum/metadata-secret: 327e091234a14bd54fe663b0f2eb6d8f7b817c2dcfa8b6fc2311334f6a68faf1
        checksum/pgbouncer-config-secret: 1dae2adc757473469686d37449d076b0c82404f61413b58ae68b3c5e99527688
        checksum/airflow-config: 8280f1a548335eb4fa2dadaae8a78f009bb408ea8725a2363cc9533a176ec5db
        checksum/extra-configmaps: e862ea47e13e634cf17d476323784fa27dac20015550c230953b526182f5cac8
        checksum/extra-secrets: e9582fdd622296c976cbc10a5ba7d6702c28a24fe80795ea5b84ba443a56c827
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: release-name-airflow-api-server
      nodeSelector: {}
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  component: api-server
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      tolerations: []
      topologySpreadConstraints: []
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        runAsUser: 50000
        fsGroup: 0
      initContainers:
      - name: wait-for-airflow-migrations
        resources: {}
        image: apache/airflow:3.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /opt/airflow/airflow.cfg
          subPath: airflow.cfg
          readOnly: true
        - name: config
          mountPath: /opt/airflow/config/airflow_local_settings.py
          subPath: airflow_local_settings.py
          readOnly: true
        args:
        - airflow
        - db
        - check-migrations
        - --migration-wait-timeout=60
        envFrom: []
        env:
        - name: AIRFLOW__CORE__FERNET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-fernet-key
              key: fernet-key
        - name: AIRFLOW_HOME
          value: /opt/airflow
        - name: AIRFLOW__CORE__SQL_ALCHEMY_CONN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-metadata
              key: connection
        - name: AIRFLOW__DATABASE__SQL_ALCHEMY_CONN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-metadata
              key: connection
        - name: AIRFLOW_CONN_AIRFLOW_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-metadata
              key: connection
        - name: AIRFLOW__API__SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-api-secret-key
              key: api-secret-key
        - name: AIRFLOW__API_AUTH__JWT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-jwt-secret
              key: jwt-secret
        - name: AIRFLOW__CELERY__BROKER_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-broker-url
              key: connection
      containers:
      - name: api-server
        image: apache/airflow:3.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
        args:
        - bash
        - -c
        - exec airflow api-server
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /opt/airflow/airflow.cfg
          subPath: airflow.cfg
          readOnly: true
        - name: config
          mountPath: /opt/airflow/config/airflow_local_settings.py
          subPath: airflow_local_settings.py
          readOnly: true
        ports:
        - name: api-server
          containerPort: 8080
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v2/version
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          failureThreshold: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v2/version
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          failureThreshold: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v2/version
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          timeoutSeconds: 20
          failureThreshold: 6
          periodSeconds: 10
        envFrom: []
        env:
        - name: AIRFLOW__CORE__FERNET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-fernet-key
              key: fernet-key
        - name: AIRFLOW_HOME
          value: /opt/airflow
        - name: AIRFLOW__CORE__SQL_ALCHEMY_CONN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-metadata
              key: connection
        - name: AIRFLOW__DATABASE__SQL_ALCHEMY_CONN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-metadata
              key: connection
        - name: AIRFLOW_CONN_AIRFLOW_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-metadata
              key: connection
        - name: AIRFLOW__API__SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-api-secret-key
              key: api-secret-key
        - name: AIRFLOW__API_AUTH__JWT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-jwt-secret
              key: jwt-secret
        - name: AIRFLOW__CELERY__BROKER_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-broker-url
              key: connection
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: release-name-config
